column4: hello, could someone give me a pointer about virtual hosts? -- I'm trying to use name-based virtual hosting purely for local development on my own laptop. I'm trying to follow this page, and its links: http://httpd.apache.org/docs/1.3/vhosts/ -- my bottom line goal is simply to have a separate document roots for separate development projects on my laptop. my httpd.conf right now: http://paste.ubuntu.com/388590/  -- but the second virtual host directive doesn'
you almost certainly are not using Apache 1.3.
Idk how I got to the 1.3 docs! thank you

if you have any specific questions, you can PM me. Otherwise, it might be a good idea to ask in an Apache/web-development channel. Ubuntu doesn't do anything weird, aside from how it divides sites; that process, and the 'a2ensite' utility, are well-documented on the Internet.
